item.title: Prologue
item.description: catabolism = breakdown or destruction of cells - ageing to reduce catabolism we need to get more activity in life Metabolism = break down + build up life blesses us anabolism = the ability to build our body cells also habits, beleifs , character , destiny and our workout routine anabolism + catabolism the longer you spend time on earth the lower your metabolism

item.title: Exersice_myths
item.description: There is thing about myths , the longer they are around the closer they get to facts myths = misinterpreting , misunderstanding, oversimplifying Spot reduction - the mother of all myths how the term movement goes with the bowel likewise burning goes with fat when you contract your muscle endlessly - the rectus abdominus in crunches or the abductor in sidekicks - they produce a by product called lactic acid this lactic acid is what gives you burn and has really nothing to do with the fat on top of the muscle.
